data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Yesterday ended last night. Today is a brand-new day.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Isn't it amazing how much stuff we get done the day before vacation?

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: The first step in solving a problem is to recognize that it does exist.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven’t really lost.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Don’t count the things you do, do the things that count.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: You are the sky. Everything else – it’s just the weather.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: Fear is a natural reaction to moving closer to the truth.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: The most difficult times for many of us are the ones we give ourselves.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: Only to the extent that we expose ourselves over and over to annihilation can that which is indestructible in us be found.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: We don't set out to save the world; we set out to wonder how other people are doing and to reflect on how our actions affect other people's hearts.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: A further sign of health is that we don't become undone by fear and trembling, but we take it as a message that it's time to stop struggling and look directly at what's threatening us.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: I used to have a sign pinned up on my wall that read: Only to the extent that we expose ourselves over and over to annihilation can that which is indestructible be found in us...It was all about letting go of everything.
